In This Section
This section contains the following topics:
Topic
Topic Name
1
Exchange of Records Between VA, the Department of Army Review Boards Agency (DARBA), and the Army Discharge Review Board (ADRB)
2
Exchange of Records Between VA and the Air Force Discharge Review Board (AFDRB)
3
Exchange of Records Between VA, the Navy Discharge Review Board (NDRB), and the Board of Correction of Naval Records (BCNR)
4
Exchange of Records Between VA and Air Force, Marine Corps, and Navy Reserve Recruiting Services
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section G - Record Exchanges Between the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) and the Service Departments
citation: Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section G
